name: Cure24
0:
”Alexa open cure it”
”Alexa launch cure it”
”purchase the cure twenty four gummies”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cure it
des:
Cure24 Sambucus Natural Elderberry Gummies with Zinc and Vitamin C, Kids & Adults, Triple Immune Support- Made in USA,60 Gummy Chews, Made with Pectin (1 Pack)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This app enables you to purchase from Amazon. 
- You can open this app by saying, "Alexa, open cure it".
- Simply say, "Alexa, purchase the cure twenty four gummies" after skill invocation to add the product to the Amazon cart.
You Also can purchase your product directly from Amazon by saying, "buy gummies"

* This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
